snippet: Arian Foster, the Texans’ four-time Pro Bowl running back, who was scheduled to make $6.5 million next season, was released after missing 12 games with injuries last season.
abstract: Houston Texans release running back Arian Foster, who missed 12 games in previous season because of injuries.
lead_paragraph: Arian Foster, the Texans’ four-time Pro Bowl running back, who was scheduled to make $6.5 million next season, was released after missing 12 games with injuries last season.

headline.print_headline: Texans Release Pro Bowl Running Back
